import React from 'react' import { Formik, Field, Form} from 'formik' import * as yup from 'yup' const Studentform = () => ( <> { setSubmitting(true) console.log(data) setSubmitting(false) }} > {({ values, errors, isSubmitting}) => ( 
{JSON.stringify(values, null, 2)}
{JSON.stringify(errors, null, 2)}
)} ) const validationSchema = yup.object({ firstName: yup .string() .required() .max(10) }) export default Studentform
